wikipedia_page.main: James Allen (18 August 1913 – 1979) was a professional footballer, who played for Stakeford Albion, Huddersfield Town and Queens Park Rangers and Clapton Orient.

response: James, Jim, or Jimmy Allen may refer to:
*Jimmy Allen (footballer, born 1909) (1909–1995), Portsmouth, Aston Villa and England footballer
*Jimmy Allen (footballer, born 1913) (1913–1979), Queens Park Rangers footballer
*Jimmy Allen (musician), member of American rock band Against All Will
